TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WorkflowTerminatedEventArgs extends System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 工作流程執行個體可以透過下列其中一種方式終止：主機呼叫 、從工作流程執行個體內叫用 活動，或工作流程執行階段引擎可能因為未處理的例外狀況而終止執行個體。A workflow instance may be terminated in one of three ways: the host may call , a activity may be invoked from inside the workflow instance, or the workflow runtime engine may terminate the instance because of an unhandled exception. 工作流程執行個體終止時，工作流程執行階段引擎會引發 事件。When the workflow instance is terminated, the workflow runtime engine raises the event. 主機會加入事件處理常式到 ，以訂閱此事件。The host may subscribe to this event by adding an event handler to . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範採用 做為參數的事件處理常式方法。The following code example demonstrates an event handler method that takes as a parameter. 引發 `OnWorkflowTerminated` 事件時，會呼叫 方法。The `OnWorkflowTerminated` method is called when the event is raised. 程式碼使用 屬性，取得與導致工作流程終止的例外狀況關聯的訊息。The code uses the property get the message associated with the exception that caused the workflow to terminate. 這個程式碼範例是 Program.cs 檔案中＜循序工作流程與參數 SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the Sequential Workflow with Parameters SDK Sample from the Program.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[循序工作流程與參數](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/17157f2d-8fed-4848-a386-e4efa381b66b)。For more information, see [Sequential Workflow with Parameters](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/17157f2d-8fed-4848-a386-e4efa381b66b). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#193](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets19.cs#193)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#193](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets19.vb#193)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Exception As Exception
public: property Exception ^ Exception { Exception ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得導致工作流程執行個體終止的例外狀況。

span.span: Gets the exception that caused the workflow instance to be terminated.

value.span: 導致工作流程執行個體終止的 。

span.span: The that caused the workflow instance to be terminated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工作流程執行個體因為未處理的例外狀況而終止時， 會包含未處理的例外狀況。When the workflow instance is terminated because of an unhandled exception, contains the unhandled exception. 如果是由主機對 的呼叫或由 活動終止工作流程執行個體時， 會包含將其 屬性設定為終止原因描述的 。When the workflow instance is terminated by either a host call to or by a activity, contains a that has its property set to a description of the reason for the termination. 如果是主機終止工作流程執行個體，它會在 `string` 參數中提供此描述給 。If the host terminates the workflow instance, it supplies this description in the `string` parameter to . 如果是 終止工作流程執行個體，則由 提供描述。If the workflow instance is terminated by a , the description is supplied by . > [!NOTE] > 雖然 不是因為未處理的例外狀況所造成，工作流程執行階段引擎仍會將終止原因的描述封裝在 的 屬性中，但不一定擲回此例外狀況。Although in the case of a event that is not due to an unhandled exception, the workflow runtime engine encapsulates a description of the reason for the termination in the property of a , it does not necessarily throw this exception. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何使用 屬性，以取得導致工作流程終止之例外狀況的相關資訊。The following code example demonstrates how you can use the property to obtain information about an exception that caused a workflow to terminate. `OnWorkflowTerminated` 方法會使用 做為參數。The `OnWorkflowTerminated` method takes a as a parameter. 引發 事件時，會呼叫此方法。This method is called when the event is raised. 程式碼使用 屬性，取得與導致工作流程終止的例外狀況關聯的訊息。The code uses the property get the message associated with the exception that caused the workflow to terminate. 這個程式碼範例是 Program.cs 檔案中＜循序工作流程與參數 SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the Sequential Workflow with Parameters SDK Sample from the Program.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[循序工作流程與參數](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/17157f2d-8fed-4848-a386-e4efa381b66b)。For more information, see [Sequential Workflow with Parameters](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/17157f2d-8fed-4848-a386-e4efa381b66b).
